comments.body: This test appears to be duplicated at ln105, also the result is not registered before the assertion. The test at ln97 is operating on the result of the task at ln84.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +148,152 @@
    # Get the info for our specific eip
    - ec2_eip_info:
        filters:
          public-ip: '{{ eip.public_ip }}'

comments.body:
```suggestion
          - associate_eip.allocation_id is defined and eip.allocation_id == associate_eip.allocation_id
          - eip_info.addresses[0].network_interface_id == eni_create_a.interface.id
```
Let's add a test to validate where we're attached here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +584,588 @@          - associate_eip is changed
          - associate_eip.public_ip is defined and eip.public_ip == associate_eip.public_ip
          - associate_eip.allocation_id is defined and eip.allocation_id == associate_eip.allocation_id
          - eip_info.addresses[0].network_interface_id == eni_create_a.interface.id
